title: Post game problems
body:
I just finished a game and for some reason the end game screen wouldnt show up so i just hit "skip waiting for results". now it says im still in a game and a cant do anything but connect to a game that doesnt exist. closing n reopening the client doesnt do anything.
I havent been able to play for a day so far due to this.

replies.body: It's fixed thx for the help wasnt sure if it happened with anyone n i actually needed tech support involved.

It sounds like you may have experienced what we refer to as a *ghost game*. This happens if there was a hiccup when the gameserver was trying to report the result of the match and that it had ended. This shouldn't normally last longer than a few hours, are you still experiencing it after restarting your computer?
